website_summaries.verdict: Perfect design for a tiered tray, as each shelf is offset from the others for easy access.
pros: Sturdy build quality, as the metal rack supports the porcelain trays well
Each of the 3 platters measures 14-inches wide and can hold plenty of items
Entire frame folds down for storage
cons: Requires more space on the table than others

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful platter stand set for parties!
customer_reviews.text: This serving platter stand set is beautiful! I plan to use it for parties because it’s functional and looks nice. The stand is easy to assemble and will be a great addition to the rest of my white serving sets. Can’t wait to use this for my next party!
customer_reviews.author: MerrY RevieWer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting one of these for a while. I like the way it can be either straight or diagonal. I’m excited for our next dinner party!
customer_reviews.author: The Beltran’s

customer_reviews.title: Very nice serving stand
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice serving stand. I really like that the plates are large size. The stand is versatile. You can set it up straight and to the side. It doesn’t take a lot of space when folder and it’s super easy to put together. The plates are great quality. You can use them without the stand as well. Overall I’m very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jalil

customer_reviews.title: Good way to display party foods
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean lines, easy to assemble and store. I bought one for my MIL and borrowed it for every party, but now I have my own and I will use it a lot! I like that it's white, it allows any colorful treats to pop!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ponsford

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant vibe, really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this purchase so I used it immediately after I received it. I put our to-go sushi rolls and cheese/cold cuts and it looks so nice I feel like were in a restaurant setting. Due to covid, we are unable to go dine out but this gives a restaurant vibe in the house. Its also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lara nilda

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: White trays are not as large as I thought. But the stand is terrible. Not sturdy at all. When you touch the stand it falls apart. We gluesd the shelves to the rack but it is still very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the set, looks so chic, loved it
customer_reviews.author: Raja

customer_reviews.title: Adds class to dinner parties
customer_reviews.text: These trays are high quality and look awesome for dinner parties. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great look for party
customer_reviews.text: It isn't super sturdy but I have used it for 3 parties and it worked great. Would buy again beautiful and great style.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality!! I am very excited to use it this weekend for an extended family get together. Only thing I am not happy with is that it is made in China, but honestly so much these days is.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Nice platter for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and worked well for rolled slices of meat.
customer_reviews.author: linda alderson

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are nice quality, the metal frame is flimsy and not stable. Good in a pinch but sturdy enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: michele f.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good value
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a $200 item from Saks - great quality and looks great on the table as well - it has different configurations so it doesn’t look like the same when you host.
customer_reviews.author: B Satuluri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very well presentable...
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived very well packages. Stand was very easy to esemble, and dishes looked very nice :) will definitely be ordering more from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Kim

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This came so fast, well before the event I needed it for! It looked beautiful with the desserts I made but with look great for serving anything! I may get a second set in the future!
customer_reviews.author: meyring

customer_reviews.title: Good displays
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for my daughter-in-law and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Happy for purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use it on my party! It looks amazing! Greate quality.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected. I really felt in love with this tiered stand. The platters are large enough that hold various food though the platters' length is 14inch. They sit well with the sturdy stand. these three porcelain platters save a good amount of the tablespace. It is a nice set. Perfect for any occasion. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Timur

customer_reviews.title: Housewarming gift
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is an item that any recipient would enjoy. I got it for a housewarming gift. It’s universally used and can be brought out for parties or hosting. If not for hosting you can use the white trays for daily use. Price is reasonable and quality is nice and thick. Looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sarit

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked nothing broke - pic shows how it arrived. It was in another box but the whole assembly was jammed in the original box as pictured. I assembled it and it appears fine.
customer_reviews.author: num1dgh

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: This is priced right, great to use, easy assembly and storage
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Hope

customer_reviews.title: Good for party
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and I am using it without stand for wings or appetizers, the stand is very nice for dessert though.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Frunze

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the plates are not flat. It doesn't sit on the table stably.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY THICK SERVING TRAYS
customer_reviews.text: THE LARGE RECTANGLE TRAYS ARE STURDY AND THICK. THE STAND, HOWEVER, IS A LITTLE WOBBLY AND AWKWARD TO SET UP WITH THE TRAYS. ONCE IN PLACE STURDIER.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the stand could be better for the price. It doesn’t match up quite right but it looks nice once it’s together.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great serving plates!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this serving plate. So easy to assemble, looks great and good size.
customer_reviews.author: Lindarittet

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I used it for an event and it worked perfectly well. Very sturdy and can hold a lot of snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Manders and Billy

product_meta.title: 3 Tier Serving Stand Tiered Serving Stand With 3 Porcelain Serving Platters Trays For Dessert Server Display Collapsible Sturdier Metal Rack Large size 14 inch
feature_bullets: PERFECT DESIGN: Compare other serving stand,our 3 tier serving stand is redesigned with stronger metal rack which allowing the porcelain platters to lock tightly into the frame. The sturdy frame prevent the serving stand from wobbling or shaking which provider more balance and stability

VERSATILE PRESENTATION SERVING STAND: These serving platters have a lip all around the edge to prevent food runaway.The serving platters could be great for appetizers, taco,snack,fruits or cheese or other desserts.Porcelain plates could be used separately as serving trays.This 3 tier serving tray would be perfect for any kind of event ,baby showers, birthdays, weddings,parties

PROFESSIONAL FOOD GRADE PORCELAIN: Made of premium white ceramic which is processed at a high temperature giving the trays an elegant texture.Lead-free Approval.Microwave/Oven/Dishwasher/refrigerator safe. The serving metal stand can be hand-wash only. The large 14 inches porcelain platters can enough for hold a variety of food! They also could be separately used as serving trays for daily use

EASY ASSEMBLY AND STORAGE: Set up takes seconds with no tools required!The assembled tiered serving stand measures 14" x 15.74" x 9.17". The swivel feature allows the user to display serving trays in several different ways, whenever you're setting out food for people to grab easily without taking up a ton of table space. The serving platters are stackable and serving stand can take part that will more easily for compact storage anywhere

IDEAL FOR SERVING: We offer the safety box.This tier serving stand can be as a wonderful gift for your friends or family.Plus, you also get 30-day No-Chip warranty: YHOSSEUN will offer a free replacement or refund if you at any time are unsatisfied with 3 tier serving stand with platters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
